about_the_game:
ASMR Food Experience: Prologue is a part of the full version of ASMR Food Experience and is completely free. The most important is that the prologue allows you to get into the world of the game so you will be fully ready before the final product release!

ASMR - Autonomous Sensory Meridian Response, is a pleasant tingling sensation around the head, neck and shoulders that occurs as a result of exposure to a specific stimulus - triggers. Typically, the triggers for this type of reaction are visual, tactile, or auditory sensations. In ASMR Food Experience: Prologue, we will focus on combining two types of stimulus: sound and visual!

Run your own restaurant!

In the ASMR Food Experience: Prologue, you play the role of the owner of a small restaurant. Some of your tasks in this simulator will be customer service. You will have to take care of proper deliveries, clean, take care of the herbarium and maintain the restaurant in the best condition. This will make a huge difference in the overall rating of your establishment, so you will increase interest, restaurant turnout and tips from guests.

Decorate and personalize

Your restaurant, your rule - would you like to have an Asian-style style? Or are you more interested in Mediterranean decor? Our simulator will allow you to run the business that best suits your taste. Decorate walls, change tables and arrange matching accessories inside and outside your restaurant! Over time, it will be more and more popular among customers, so you need to consider expanding your restaurant.

Omnipresent sounds

There will be tons of sounds in the ASMR Food Experience: Prologue to help you experience the most desirable reactions - calmness, excitement, stress relief, and more. In the game, you will have full control over what sounds are in it: nature, cooking, cleaning, conversations or street sounds. Find something for yourself in this amazing simulator!
detailed_description:

About the Game






ASMR Food Experience: Prologue is a part of the full version of ASMR Food Experience and is completely free. The most important is that the prologue allows you to get into the world of the game so you will be fully ready before the final product release!

ASMR - Autonomous Sensory Meridian Response, is a pleasant tingling sensation around the head, neck and shoulders that occurs as a result of exposure to a specific stimulus - triggers. Typically, the triggers for this type of reaction are visual, tactile, or auditory sensations. In ASMR Food Experience: Prologue, we will focus on combining two types of stimulus: sound and visual!

In the ASMR Food Experience: Prologue, you play the role of the owner of a small restaurant. Some of your tasks in this simulator will be customer service. You will have to take care of proper deliveries, clean, take care of the herbarium and maintain the restaurant in the best condition. Our simulator will allow you to run the business that best suits your taste. Decorate walls, change tables and arrange matching accessories inside and outside your restaurant! name: ASMR Food Experience: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 Ghz or AMD Phenom II 2.6 Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB & AMD 7970 or nVidia 770 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64
  • Processor: Fourth Generation Intel Core i5 2.5 Ghz or AMD FX8350 4.0 Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB & nVidia 960 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device

short_description: Prologue is just part of the gameplay that awaits you in the full game. If you are looking for tones that will put you in an amazing mood, you've come to the right place! In the game, we have connected the game with the tones of the world around us. Open, manage, and listen to your own restaurant!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Thai
*languages with full audio support
